other_tests.findings: Obsessive Compulsive Scale score was 32 prior to DBS.
other_tests.changes_over_time: After DBS, the score decreased to 10, indicating significant improvement in OCD symptoms.

other_tests.date: Baseline (pre-stimulation) and 8 months after DBS began
other_tests.findings: At baseline, the stop-signal reaction time performance was impaired (z=1.0). After DBS, it changed little (post-treatment z=0.8).
other_tests.changes_over_time: Despite significant improvement in OCD symptoms, the stop-signal reaction time performance had minimal change.
